properties.displayName: Imports Registry Key From an ADS
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (((ProcessCommandLine contains " /i " or ProcessCommandLine contains ".reg") and ProcessCommandLine matches regex ":[^ \\\\]") and (FolderPath endswith "\\regedit.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "REGEDIT.EXE")) and (not((ProcessCommandLine contains " -e " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /e " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -a " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /a " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -c " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /c ")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the import of a alternate datastream to the registry with regedit.exe.
